title: i have a 59% winrate in ranked...
body:
yet for every win i gain only 13 lp and every loss -23/25???????? wtf in the order im winning/losing games it is literally impossible for me to climb id win maybe 2 games in a row and have 26 lp then i lose one and have 3 lp rinse and repeat ive played nothing but ranked all day and have made  ZERO progress because of how much im punished for losing, what the fuck riot????

Edit: thank everyone for the advice i will be sure to use it.
